summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 6, Lafayette Place Addition, being the alley between 17th Avenue South and Lafayette Avenue, from Horton Street to Hinds Street; and certain other alleys and streets, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 15103 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
